title: Conference Call to Discuss Vice President Biden's Upcoming Trip to Ukraine and Georgia | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 16, 2009

 



Conference Call to Discuss Vice President Biden's Upcoming Trip to Ukraine and Georgia







THE WHITE HOUSE

			Office of the Vice President
			____________________________________________________________________
			For Immediate Release                                                 July 16, 2009

			**Media Advisory**

Conference Call to Discuss Vice President Biden’s Upcoming Trip to Ukraine and Georgia


		Washington, DC – Vice President Biden will be traveling next week to Ukraine and Georgia. During the visit, the Vice President will meet with the political leadership of each country, as well as opposition figures and civil society representatives. The Vice President will demonstrate U.S. support for continued democratic and economic reforms and discuss issues of mutual interest in both countries. National Security Advisor to the Vice President, Tony Blinken, will hold a conference call with journalists on FRIDAY, July 17th at 3:00 PM EDT to discuss the purpose and significance of the trip.

		WHAT: Conference Call with Journalists to Discuss Vice President Biden’s trip to Ukraine and Georgia

		WHO: National Security Advisor to the Vice President Tony Blinken

		WHEN: FRIDAY, July 17th 3:00 PM EDT

		WHERE: Please email press@ovp.eop.gov for the conference call information.
